sentence.Network_en: The main species are pine, spruce, fir, Cheng Chi, Euptelea , Cercidiphyllum, and so on.
sentence.Network_cn: 主要品种有红松 、 云杉 、 冷杉 、 赤桦 、 领春木、连香树等.

PerfectNetExp.abs: cerchi 切尔基, cercidiphyllum 连香树属, cerci 肛尾叶

auth_sentence.content: The katsura, Cercidiphyllum japonicum, loved for the toffee smell from its fallen leaves, has Rotfuchs', a purple upright form.
